programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: A Hero Ain't Nothing But a Sandwich

programme.title: A Comuna
programme.desc: Nos anos 70, o casal Erik e Anna realiza um sonho e, juntamente com a filha, monta uma comuna em Copenhaga. Há amizade, amor e vida em conjunto debaixo do mesmo teto, até que um devastador caso de amor sujeita a comuna ao seu maior teste.

programme.title: A Desaparecida, o Aleijado e os Trogloditas
programme.desc: O xerife Franklin Hunt junta um grupo de homens para tentar resgatar uma jovem sequestrada. Mas o que ele não imagina é que os seus inimigos são canibais, que vivem à margem da civilização e vão transformar o resgate numa missão de sobrevivência.

programme.title: A Experiência Belko
programme.desc: Numa retorcida experiência social, 80 americanos são trancados no edifício dos escritórios da sua empresa em Bogotá, na Colômbia. Entretanto, recebem ordens de uma voz misteriosa, que os instiga a participar num jogo mortal que implica matar ou ser morto...

programme.title: Jogos Quase Perigosos
programme.desc: O agiota Chili Palmer está envolvido com o seu negócio. Quando chega a Los Angeles para receber uma dívida do fracassado cineasta Harry Zimm, Chili é duro... e dá a Harry uma ideia para um argumento.

programme.title: Os Reis do Submundo
programme.desc: Harlem, anos 30. Após cumprir uma pena, Bumpy Johnson torna-se guarda-costas de Stephanie St. Clair, a rainha da loteria. O seu negócio de apostas ilegais é cobiçado por Dutch Schultz, que faz com que ela seja presa. Bumpy fica à frente da empresa, mas os planos de Schultz desencadeiam uma guerra.

programme.title: O Massacre de Amityville
programme.desc: Baseado na história verídica de Ronald DeFeo Jr. que, em 1974, assassinou a sua família inteira com uma espingarda enquanto esta dormia. No seu julgamento, DeFeo alegou ter sido influenciado por "vozes" que ouvia dentro de casa.

programme.title: Las Vegas
programme.sub-title: When Life Gives You Lemon Bars

programme.title: The Florida Project
programme.desc: A história Moonee, uma menina precoce de 6 anos e dos seus amigos, numas férias de verão cheias de possibilidades e aventuras. Entretanto, os adultos à volta lutam contra dificuldades várias, a escassos quilómetros do mundo mágico dos parques temáticos.

programme.title: O Senhor Babadook
programme.desc: Uma mãe, atormentada pela morte violenta do marido, luta contra o medo noturno que o filho tem de um monstro. Mas rapidamente descobre que uma presença sinistra se esconde na sua casa.

programme.title: Amar-te à Meia-Noite
programme.desc: Katie Price, de 17 anos, vive protegida em casa devido a uma doença genética rara, uma sensibilidade à luz solar. No entanto, certa noite ao sair, os seus sonhos tornam-se realidade quando Charlie, por quem tem uma paixoneta, repara nela e a convida para sair.

programme.title: Inferno Canibal
programme.desc: Um grupo de estudantes ativistas viaja até à Amazónia para salvar a floresta tropical. Mas rapidamente descobre que não estão ali sozinhos e que nenhuma boa ação fica impune...

programme.title: A Desaparecida, o Aleijado e os Trogloditas
programme.desc: O xerife Franklin Hunt junta um grupo de homens para tentar resgatar uma jovem sequestrada. Mas o que ele não imagina é que os seus inimigos são canibais, que vivem à margem da civilização e vão transformar o resgate numa missão de sobrevivência.

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. Cook"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1471491/","name":"Jeff Davis"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Criminal Minds: Drive","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2969812249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Criminal Minds: Drive"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Criminal Minds
Mentes Criminosas
programme.desc:
Criminal Minds: Created by Jeff Davis. With Matthew Gray Gubler, Kirsten Vangsness, A.J. Cook, Joe Mantegna. The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. Cook"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067205/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0085751/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1471491/","name":"Jeff Davis"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Criminal Minds: Drive","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2969812249","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5MmQ5NjctOWM2OS00NDMxLWFlNmYtZTAzNGFkMjIzZmUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Criminal Minds: Drive"}}</script><metacontent="

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. programme.title: Jonah Hex
programme.desc: No velho oeste, um caçador de recompensas esconde o seu bom coração por trás do seu rosto deformado e da sua personalidade forte. Mais uma vítima do terrível Quentin Turnbull, Hex, que deveria ter morrido num atentado contra a sua vida, ressuscitou.... com sede de vingança.

programme.title: Réplicas
programme.desc: William Foster, um neurocientista genial, está prestes a fazer uma grande descoberta ao nível da consciência humana, quando a sua família morre num trágico acidente. Desesperado para ressuscitar aqueles que perdeu, William tenta criar réplicas.

programme.title: A Cidade Perdida de Z
programme.desc: A história do explorador inglês Percy Fawcett que, no início do século XX, descobre na Amazónia provas de uma civilização desconhecida. Ridicularizado pela comunidade científica, Fawcett regressa para provar a teoria, mas desaparece misteriosamente.

Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strike again." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0452046/","name":"Criminal Minds","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE2ZmFkZTYtNjRiOS00ZjE3LThjOWMtZTViZjRmNDFjNTQwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the F.B.I. Behavioral Analysis Unit (B.A.U.), an elite group of profilers who analyze the nation's most dangerous serial killers and individual heinous crimes in an effort to anticipate their next moves before they strik","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0452046/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Brkl30","dateCreated":"2005-12-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Crime Drama","reviewBody":"Criminal Minds shows the viewers that it takes wits to beat the bad guys. The common link between CM & CSI is that the question of "How?" is always more interesting.

The only difference: CSI centers around physical evidence gathering & collecting the pieces to solve a puzzle.

Criminal Minds involves more psychology & sociology. We, as viewers, want to know what makes someone tick as a way to prevent crimes from occurring again.

Another reason why I enjoy this showed so much is how the characters put their expertise in play to solve some of the most twisted people around.

As casting is concerned: Patinkin is perfect as Jason Gideon. If you think about it, he's more like a professor citing famous lines from Einstein, Faulkner, etc.

When I first read those lines, it didn't make sense at first, but as you watch each episode , the lines that Gideon cites has more meaning to it.

For example: Einstein: "Imagination is more important than knowledge.Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." Gideon is saying that the human mind is the deadliest weapon of all, & we are capable of anything & everything of achieving all kinds of possibilities.

In conclusion, Criminal Minds is the kind the of show that anyone can enjoy.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":177823,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.1,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2005-09-22","keywords":"serial killer,serial murder,murder,21st century,2000s","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131557/","name":"Matthew Gray Gubler","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1494536/","name":"Kirsten Vangsness","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176882/","name":"A.J. programme.title: Para Além dos Limites
programme.desc: Michael é um vigarista ambicioso que elabora um plano para roubar um casino de luxo na Europa. No entanto, quando está prestes a alcançar o objetivo, encontra pela frente um enigmático rival e, misteriosamente, perde tudo vendo o seu plano desmascarado.

programme.title: Monstros Fantásticos e Onde Encontrá-los
programme.desc: 1926. Newt Scamander viaja à volta do mundo para encontrar e documentar um conjunto extraordinário de criaturas mágicas. Chegado a Nova Iorque para uma rápida estadia, até passaria despercebido... não fosse um "SemMage", uma mala mágica extraviada e a fuga de algumas das suas criaturas fantásticas!

programme.title: Matem o Mensageiro
programme.desc: Webb descobre uma história que o leva a investigar as origens da epidemia de crack que assolou as ruas. Fica a saber do envolvimento da CIA no contrabando de cocaína, usando os lucros para armar os rebeldes na Nicarágua. Webb atrai um tipo de atenção que ameaça a sua carreira e a sua família.

programme.title: Força Anti-Crime
programme.desc: Los Angeles, 1949. Mickey Cohen, um impiedoso gangster, tem a cidade na sua mão. Contra um gangue protegido pela crescente corrupção, Bill Parker recruta o sargento John O'Mara, reunindo uma unidade especial para repor a justiça. As ordens não são para prender criminosos, mas sim iniciar uma guerra.

programme.title: Sempre Loucos
programme.desc: Comédia que conta as explorações hilariantes de uma banda fenómeno dos anos 70, os "Strange Fruit", quando se reúnem 20 anos após uma separação difícil e tentam readquirir a fama e fortuna entretanto perdidas.

programme.title: Professora Baldas
programme.desc: Uma professora preguiçosa e incompetente, que odeia a sua profissão, os seus alunos e colegas, é forçada a voltar a dar aulas quando o noivo rico a deixa antes do casamento. Como tal, Elizabeth Halsey está decidida a encontrar um substituto à altura!

programme.title: O Jardim da Esperança
programme.desc: A história verídica de uma mulher que salvou centenas de vidas, durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial. A gerir com o marido o zoo de Varsóvia, os dois colaboram com a Resistência e resgatam pessoas do Gueto de Varsóvia, colocando-se em risco, bem como a tudo o que construíram.

programme.title: A Fúria do Último Escuteiro
programme.desc: Um ex-segurança presidencial, que agora é um detetive privado, investiga um homicídio que envolve um político e uma equipa de futebol americano.

programme.title: O Reino
programme.desc: Quando um terrorista detona uma bomba numa zona residencial norte-americana em Riad, é desencadeado um incidente internacional. Enquanto os diplomatas debatem equações de territorialidade, o agente especial do FBI Ronald Fleury reúne rapidamente uma equipa de elite e negoceia uma viagem secreta.

programme.title: Impune
programme.desc: Um jovem polícia é enviado para uma esquadra num bairro de classe média, onde cresceu. No entanto, um velho segredo ameaça vir à superfície e, consequentemente, destruir a sua vida e a sua família.

programme.title: Nova Iorque 1997
programme.desc: Perante o aumento do índice criminal, os EUA transformaram Nova Iorque numa prisão de segurança máxima. Quando o avião do presidente dos EUA cai lá dentro, Snake Plissken, um prisioneiro e ex-herói de guerra, tem 24 horas para libertá-lo e assim ganhar a própria liberdade.

programme.title: Destroyer: Ajuste de Contas
programme.desc: A odisseia moral e existencialista da detetive da Polícia de Los Angeles Erin Bell que, enquanto jovem agente, esteve infiltrada num gangue no deserto da Califórnia. Um caso que resultou em trágicas consequências.

programme.title: Inveja
programme.desc: Tim e Nick são amigos, vizinhos e colegas de trabalho. Até ao dia em que Tim despreza uma ideia de Nick, que até aí fora um azarado, mas que agora fica milionário à conta da sua mais recente invenção: o "Vapoorizer". Tim fica verde de inveja à medida que a fortuna de Nick cresce.

programme.title: Jogos de Poder
programme.desc: A história verídica sobre um congressista texano, Charlie Wilson, com gosto para as bebidas e para as mulheres. Com a ajuda de um agente da CIA, com métodos pouco ortodoxos, a dupla financiou, sozinha, as guerrilhas afegãs nos anos 80, de modo a combater a invasão soviética do território.

programme.title: O Castor
programme.desc: Walter Black é um homem cuja depressão tomou conta da sua vida. Sem saber mais o que fazer para o ajudar, e temendo que aquela prostração prejudique o crescimento dos filhos de ambos, Meredith, a sua mulher, opta pelo divórcio. É então que Walter encontra um "castor-fantoche".

programme.title: Os Filhos do Homem
programme.desc: Em 2027, o ser humano está à beira da extinção: os homens perderam a capacidade de procriar e, por algum motivo que se desconhece, as mulheres tornaram-se estéreis. Ao mesmo tempo, o mundo estremece quando morre um jovem de 18 anos, a pessoa mais jovem do planeta. A situação é caótica.

programme.title: Operação Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A coronel Katherine Powell comanda uma operação, no Quénia, que tem como objetivo capturar terroristas no Quénia. Contudo, vê a sua missão alterada de "captura" para "morte", no momento em que uma menina de nove anos entra na zona de conflito e origina uma disputa internacional.

programme.title: À Procura de uma Estrela
programme.desc: Adam Jones é um chef que destruiu a sua carreira com drogas e atitudes de diva. No entanto, após conseguir ficar sóbrio novamente, volta para Londres determinado a redimir-se e a tornar-se gerente de um restaurante de topo, capaz de ganhar três estrelas Michelin.

programme.title: Os Maias - Cenas da Vida Romântica
programme.desc: Como médico aristocrata, Carlos leva uma vida ociosa na companhia do seu amigo e escritor de obras "inacabadas" João da Ega. Um dia conhece Maria Eduarda, uma mulher bela e cheia de mistérios que acabou de chegar à capital. A paixão é recíproca e os dois vivem um amor cego...

programme.title: Infiltrado
programme.desc: A história verídica de Robert Mazur: um homem contra o maior cartel do mundo, o de Pablo Escobar. Durante a década de 80, o agente infiltra-se, sob o disfarce de Robert Musella e descobre um meio corrompido e cego. Mazur fica assim sob a proteção daqueles que tinha prometido destruir...

programme.title: Ex_Machina
programme.desc: Caleb, um jovem programador da maior empresa de Internet do mundo, participa numa experiência estranha e fascinante. Ele deverá interagir com a primeira inteligência artificial do mundo, incorporada no corpo de uma bonita rapariga robótica.

programme.title: Professora Baldas
programme.desc: Uma professora preguiçosa e incompetente, que odeia a sua profissão, os seus alunos e colegas, é forçada a voltar a dar aulas quando o noivo rico a deixa antes do casamento. Como tal, Elizabeth Halsey está decidida a encontrar um substituto à altura!

programme.title: Um Domingo Qualquer
programme.desc: O treinador de uma equipa de futebol americano vive um fim de época atribulado ao entrar em conflito com a proprietária do clube.

programme.title: A Fúria do Último Escuteiro
programme.desc: Um ex-segurança presidencial, que agora é um detetive privado, investiga um homicídio que envolve um político e uma equipa de futebol americano.

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Um antigo lenhador vem em auxílio de uma mulher que regressa à sua cidade natal no Noroeste do Pacífico e se vê assediada e perseguida por um ex-polícia transformado em senhor do crime.

programme.title: Sempre Loucos
programme.desc: Comédia que conta as explorações hilariantes de uma banda fenómeno dos anos 70, os "Strange Fruit", quando se reúnem 20 anos após uma separação difícil e tentam readquirir a fama e fortuna entretanto perdidas.

programme.title: O Cume de Dante
programme.desc: A povoação da pitoresca localidade de Dante's Peak nunca acreditou que aquilo lhe pudesse acontecer! Mas o perigo é real: o vulcão adormecido está a despertar, e o único homem que os pode salvar do terrível pesadelo natural não consegue fazer com que ninguém lhe dê ouvidos.

programme.title: Atraídos pelo Crime
programme.desc: Três polícias de Brooklyn, que nunca antes se encontraram, acabam por ver os seus caminhos cruzados, depois de terem tido carreiras muito diferentes. Isto porque uma rusga antidroga, parte da "Operação Limpeza", os encaminha para a mesma cena de crime fatal...

programme.title: Blade Runner - Perigo Iminente
programme.desc: Em 2019, há uma classe de androides, os "Replicants": semelhantes ao Homem, mas com uma existência curta. O chefe da polícia de LA encarrega Rick Deckard de localizar e destruir as unidades em fuga. Na perseguição, Deckard conhece Rachel, que lhe dá uma nova perspetiva sobre os seres artificiais.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, um novo blade runner da Polícia de Los Angeles, desvenda um segredo há muito enterrado que pode mergulhar no caos o que resta da sociedade. Esta descoberta leva-o numa missão para localizar Rick Deckard, um antigo blade runner da Polícia de Los Angeles, desaparecido há 30 anos.

programme.title: Basta Juntar Paixão
programme.desc: Quando Kelly e Jason, completos opostos, competem num famoso programa de culinária pela oportunidade de terem o seu próprio restaurante, o que importará mais: as suas carreiras culinárias ou o seu possível amor?

programme.title: Outlander
Outlander
programme.desc: Outlander: Created by Ronald D. Moore. With Caitriona Balfe, Sam Heughan, Duncan Lacroix, Sophie Skelton. programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Tout Homme Ressemble à Sa Douleur
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mysteries: Receita para Matar
programme.desc: A psicóloga e antiga procuradora Hailey Dean ajuda o seu amigo, o detetive Fincher Garland, a investigar uma crescente vaga de homicídios no hospital Atlanta Memorial, quando a namorada de Fincher, a médica Meghan Phillips, é considerada suspeita do primeiro homicídio.

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mysteries: Sentença de Morte
programme.desc: Hailey Dean sabe que a procuradora Paulina D'Orazio está inocente no homicídio de um homem que em tempos mandou para a prisão, e tem de fazer tudo ao seu alcance para o provar perante o número crescente de provas contra ela.

programme.title: Onde Reside o Amor
programme.desc: Finn, uma estudante universitária, vai passar o verão à Califórnia, na casa onde vive a sua avó e a sua tia. Tem de acabar a sua tese de doutoramento e refletir sobre uma importante decisão: se vai aceitar o pedido de casamento de Sam, o seu namorado.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Il N'Est Pas de Trahison Qu'On Ne Pardonne
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Candice Renoir

programme.sub-title: Qui Sème Le Vent Récolte La Tempête
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Uma Noite Com o Presidente
programme.desc: Andrew Shepherd é Presidente dos EUA e apaixona-se por uma ecologista de um grupo de pressão, que é uma intrigante política a favor do ambiente. À medida que o romance progride, a popularidade de Andrew começa a cair.

programme.title: Você Tem Uma Mensagem
programme.desc: Dois livreiros criam uma rivalidade quando um deles, com um negócio em maior escala, quase leva o outro à falência. No entanto, sem que saibam, os dois vão comunicando pela internet e acabam por se apaixonar. O problema é que, na vida real, eles se odeiam...

programme.title: Páscoa Infiltrada
programme.desc: Erin Cavendish infiltra-se na fábrica de chocolate da família para ver porque é que as vendas baixaram, e lá conhece o chefe chocolateiro Bryan, que tem ideias para inovar a linha de produtos para a Páscoa.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Il N'Est Pas de Trahison Qu'On Ne Pardonne
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hailey Dean Mysteries: Sentença de Morte
programme.desc: Hailey Dean sabe que a procuradora Paulina D'Orazio está inocente no homicídio de um homem que em tempos mandou para a prisão, e tem de fazer tudo ao seu alcance para o provar perante o número crescente de provas contra ela.

programme.title: Flower Shop Mystery: Crisântemos Para Que Vos Quero
programme.desc: Abby Knight volta à sua cidade natal para abrir uma loja de flores mas, no dia da inauguração, o seu carro sofre um acidente por causa de um criminoso em fuga.

programme.title: O Sorriso de Mona Lisa
programme.desc: Em 1953, uma professora de História da Arte num colégio para raparigas tenta alargar os estreitos horizontes das suas brilhantes alunas. O maior desafio será fazer com que as estudantes encontrem (e assumam) a sua identidade cultural, partindo da visão ampla e desafiante dos novos conhecimentos.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.sub-title: Notre Pire Ennemi Se Cache Dans Notre Coeur
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Candice Renoir
Candice Renoir
programme.desc:
Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter"},"dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

IMDb data; ttnr: 2819924, Title: Candice Renoir, --- Description: Candice Renoir: Created by Robin Barataud, Brigitte Peskine, Solen Roy-Pagenault. With Cécile Bois, Raphaël Lenglet, Clara Antoons, Ali Marhyar. The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine is between solving crimes, taking out fights with her much younger female police superior officer, getting her kids to school - in addition - handling their problems too and keeping her team in line. It's a very funny and witty series with a lot of french charm and intelligent story writing. Not another dull crime series all over again. It's like a fresh french breeze on the TV screen. Candice is like a female Columbo version in high heels, handbag pink scarf and a 9mm in her holster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2819924/","name":"Candice Renoir","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWM3YzUxM2UtZjIyMC00Zjg5LTk0NTMtNGQ3ZWQ0ODhlMTJjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc0NTExNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story circles around French police officer Commandant Candice Renoir and her team solving different crime cases in a harbor city of south France. Candice herself is a mother of 4 children and recently divorced. Her daily routine ","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2819924/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Doctor_Dexter","dateCreated":"2016-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"The female sitcom-detective cliché","reviewBody":"Over the last decades, in Europe, we've been swamped with the older female detective character with a family in tow. Some have a weak excuse for a husband to emphasise their strength, many others are independent single mothers who struggle with a demanding job and raising their kids. To be honest, I'm not a fan of the genre. Nothing against strong and independent women, au contraire. I just prefer decent detective work above being sucked into the personal life of a fictional character. If I wanted to see family drama I'd go watch a sitcom. It's beyond me why the detective genre has to be muddled with sitcom-esque fluff like this. (I wouldn't buy it, but it's programmed on TV *instead* of a proper detective). I can accept a modest degree of family life. After all, Beck and Wallander have families too. However, they are primarily detectives, and every episode is about solving the case. 

"Candice Renoir" is more sitcom than detectives. And it's just as tacky and kitschy as the name already suggests. A fifty-something big mama, who seems to think she's Brigitte Bardot in the seventies, miraculously becomes the team leader of a small town detective team. She blunders through everything, but 'magically' finds clues in fashion magazines and the likes. She's supposed to portray the strong and independent older woman who can do it all, kids and playing the boss- detective, but it's way to contrived to be the least bit believable. Her character, the rainbow team, the younger cutesy neighbour - who has stamped "love interest" in all caps across his handsome forehead - it's all a stylised light version of a concept we've seen many, many times before. And now it's here again, only worse. Yay. 

To be fair, the acting of the team and other characters varies from passable to decent, but the lead actress is really milking the diva character, and as such, overacting horribly in just about every scene.

It might just about do as daytime TV, on a rainy afternoon, but that's probably me being generous.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1069,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5,"contentRating":"TV-G","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2013-04-19","keywords":"france,female police officer,police","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092291/","name":"Cécile Bois","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0501845/","name":"Raphaël Lenglet","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6511436/","name":"Clara Antoons"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011107/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053077/","name":"Robin Barataud","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0043904/","name":"Brigitte Peskine","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2784794/","name":"Solen Roy-Pagenault"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Promo Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2892283161","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FhNWFlYmItYmE5My00ZmM0LThlZDctZGE5YjhiMThkZDQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""</script><metacontent=" --- Director: Pascal Lahmani, Nicolas Picard-Dreyfuss, Stéphane Malhuret, Olivier Barma, Raphaël Lenglet

programme.title: Maggie Tem um Plano
programme.desc: Maggie apaixona-se por um homem casado, que se divorcia para ficar com ela. Passados três anos, Maggie deixa de ver sentido na relação e encontra-se numa encruzilhada: o que fazer quando se descobre que o nosso namorado e a ex-mulher são o par perfeito?

programme.title: Basta
programme.desc: Slim, empregada de balcão, pensava ter encontrado a felicidade ao casar com Mitch. Depois da chegada do primeiro bebé, o retrato perfeito é quebrado e ela descobre o lado negro escondido de Mitch, abusivo e controlador. Preocupada com a segurança da filha, Slim foge de casa, mas Mitch persegue-as.

programme.title: Guerra de Casamentos
programme.desc: Depois de um organizador de festas gay descobrir que o irmão está por trás do discurso do governador contra o casamento entre homossexuais, decide fazer greve para exigir direitos iguais.

programme.title: FicaEmCasa
programme.desc: Dois anos após o início da pandemia de Covid-19, um grupo de amigos faz uma festa online cheia de jogos, bebida e droga. Depois de tomarem ecstasy, as coisas começam a correr mal e as suas casas tornam-se muito mais aterrorizantes do que o mundo lá fora...

programme.title: A Noite da Vingança
programme.desc: Um advogado sul-americano recebe um dia a boleia de um estranho sedutor e convida-o a visitar a sua casa. Só que a mulher, quando o ouve, fica com a certeza que ele era um alto oficial do antigo regime, que então a torturou e violou, e prende-o para forçá-lo a confessar.

programme.title: A Rapariga Invisível
programme.desc: Uma jovem que desapareceu ao ponto de se tornar invisível quer encontrar o caminho de volta com a ajuda do único homem que pode vê-la.

programme.title: Desculpa! Uma História Sobre Bullying
programme.desc: Jochem é vítima de bullying na escola. O seu amigo David não participa, mas tem medo de dizer alguma coisa. Quando o diretor da escola conta à turma que Jochem não voltou para casa depois de uma festa, David sente-se culpado. Mas será que é tarde demais?

programme.title: Cometa
programme.desc: Situada num universo paralelo, a história de "Cometa" salta para trás e para a frente na linha de tempo, percorrendo seis anos da vida de um casal improvável, mas perfeitamente emparelhado.

programme.title: Duelo Imortal - Parte II
programme.desc: No futuro, o espadachim imortal Connor MacLeod, que está a ser perseguido por extraterrestres mercenários, tem de prevenir a destruição da Terra, que vive quase na escuridão devido ao escudo criado para fazer face à degradação da camada de ozono.

programme.title: Duelo Imortal III
programme.desc: Pensando que ganhou o derradeiro Prémio e é o único imortal, Connor MacLeod vê a sua vida pacata terminar quando Kane, que estava há séculos preso numa gruta no Japão, se vê liberto do seu túmulo e parte em busca do espadachim para o matar.

programme.title: A Legião dos Duros
programme.desc: Em Marselha, em 1925, Alain é um pugilista que é contratado por um mafioso para perder um combate. Quando não cumpre o acordado, vê-se forçado a fugir e acaba por se alistar na Legião Estrangeira e ser enviado para combater em Marrocos.

programme.title: Os Três Duques
programme.desc: As aventuras dos primos Bo, Luke e Daisy: os três duques. Eles e o velho tio Jesse tentam salvar a quinta da família da destruição, às mãos do comissário corrupto Boss Hogg. Para isso, contam com o "General Lee", nome de batismo do seu carro favorito, um Dodge Charger de 1969.

programme.title: Singularidade
programme.desc: Terra 2020: três quartos das famílias têm um robô. O supercomputador Kronos considera os seres humanos a maior ameaça ao planeta e usa os robôs para os matar. Um século depois, poucos humanos restam e a jovem Calia procura o último reduto da humanidade, só que Kronos também.

programme.title: Reprisal: Contra-Ataque
programme.desc: Jacob Tasker testemunha um assalto ao banco onde trabalha e decide tentar apanhar o assaltante com a ajuda do seu amigo, James Richardson, um polícia reformado. Mas quando o assaltante se apercebe da situação retalia e rapta a família de Jacob...

programme.title: 10 Minutos
programme.desc: Um homem perde a memória no seguimento de um assalto que correu mal. Mas para saber quem o sabotou, terá de recuperar os 10 minutos que falham na sua memória.

programme.title: Stallone Prisioneiro
programme.desc: Prestes a ser libertado por um crime menor que cometeu, um prisioneiro é transferido para uma prisão onde o diretor vai fazer os possíveis para que ele tenha uma vida infernal.

programme.title: Tripla Ameaça
programme.desc: Três mercenários caídos em desgraça terão de liquidar um grupo de assassinos profissionais antes que estes alcancem o seu alvo, a filha de um bilionário...

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: Red e Mandy levam uma vida tranquila numa cabana isolada junto a um lago do Colorado. Um dia, a sua casa é invadida por membros de uma seita religiosa que matam Mandy e deixam Red à beira da morte. Traumatizado, apenas uma coisa o mantém preso à vida: um intenso desejo de punir os responsáveis.

programme.title: Uma Casa na Bruma
programme.desc: Massoud Amir Behrani é um imigrante iraniano que decide aplicar as suas finanças na aquisição de uma casa na Califórnia. Mas esta foi colocada à venda por um engano que a proprietária, Kathy Nicolo, não consegue desfazer, e as duas partes irão levar o confronto até às últimas consequências.

programme.title: Banho de Sangue
programme.desc: Quando o filho de um juiz afro-americano é morto por dois oficiais da polícia e o sistema os coloca em liberdade, um detetive veterano encontra provas que incriminam os agentes e o juiz alia-se a outro pai enlutado para fazer justiça pelas próprias mãos.

programme.title: O Jantar
programme.desc: Dois casais reúnem-se num restaurante de luxo para decidir o que fazer em relação a um crime que os filhos de ambos cometeram: deixá-los sofrer as consequências e passar por um sistema penal que os marcará para sempre ou fechar os olhos e validar um comportamento inaceitável?

programme.title: A Belle Époque
programme.desc: Um casal de meia-idade vive uma crise e a separação é inevitável. Mas nem tudo está perdido... Vítor tem a oportunidade de retroceder no tempo e reviver a semana mais marcante da sua vida: aquela em que conheceu o seu grande amor, há 40 anos.

programme.title: Clara
programme.desc: Isaac Bruno é um astrónomo que busca a vida no Cosmos e foge de uma tragédia do seu passado. Quando conhece Clara, uma artista de mente aberta que partilha o seu fascínio pelo espaço, os dois decidem colaborar na busca de uma grande descoberta.

programme.title: Regra de Silêncio
programme.desc: A vida de Jim Grant sofre uma reviravolta quando um jovem jornalista expõe a sua verdadeira identidade como ex-membro de um grupo radical antiguerra procurado por homicídio. Depois de 30 anos com outra identidade, Grant é obrigado a fugir.

programme.title: Capitão Cuecas - O Filme (V.P.)
programme.desc: George e Harold passam os dias a criar histórias de banda desenhada e a sonhar com partidas. Um dia hipnotizam, acidentalmente, o diretor da escola, levando-o a acreditar que é o Capitão Cuecas, um super-herói completamente tolo, vestido apenas de cuecas e capa.

programme.title: Aposta de Risco
programme.desc: No mundo das apostas desportivas bem altas, podem nascer fortunas ou derrotas. Quando Brandon Lang se torna o protegido do apostador Walter Abrams, dá nas vistas graças à sua impressionante capacidade de prever resultados. Agora, com milhões em jogo, encontra-se num jogo mortal com o mentor.

programme.title: The International - A Organização
programme.desc: Louis Salinger, agente da Interpol, e Eleanor Whitman, assistente do procurador-geral de Manhattan, querem desmascarar as atividades ilícitas de um dos bancos mais poderosos do mundo. Seguem o dinheiro de Berlim a Nova Iorque, de Milão a Istambul, e são até obrigados a contornar as leis.

programme.title: Eternamente Jovem
programme.desc: Em 1939, o piloto de ensaios Daniel McCormick depara-se com a morte do amor da sua vida. Incapaz de encarar a vida sozinho, ele oferece-se como voluntário para uma experiência criogénica secreta, mas quando acorda, em 1992, a realidade que encontra é-lhe totalmente desconhecida.

programme.title: Esquecido
programme.desc: Estamos em 2073 e todo o planeta se encontra destruído após um ataque alienígena, há 60 anos, que obrigou à evacuação da população. Jack Harper é enviado para terminar uma missão cuja importância é vital para a sobrevivência da Humanidade, que vive agora numa colónia sob condições artificiais.

programme.title: Instinto Fatal 2
programme.desc: A romancista Catherine Tramell está novamente a braços com a lei e o psiquiatra Dr. Michael Glass é destacado pela Scotland Yard para a avaliar. No entanto, tal como o detective Nick Curran antes dele, Glass envolve-se com Tramell e é arrastado para um perigoso jogo de sedução.

programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted
FBI: Most Wanted
programme.desc: FBI: Most Wanted: Created by Rene Balcer. With Julian McMahon, Roxy Sternberg, Keisha Castle-Hughes, YaYa Gosselin. programme.title: FBI: Most Wanted

programme.title: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation
CSI: Crime Sob Investigação
programme.desc: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation: Created by Anthony E. Zuiker. With George Eads, Eric Szmanda, Robert David Hall, Paul Guilfoyle. Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0247082/","name":"CSI: Crime Scene Investigation","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRlZjFmNTktYzg0ZC00OWJlLWJlN2EtOGQ1OTRiOTFiMWE3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Series following an elite team of police forensic evidence investigation experts as they work their cases in Las Vegas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0247082/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"=G="},"dateCreated":"2004-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertainment on steroids","reviewBody":"The hugely popular "CSI" is no less than a contemporary entertainment marvel. Finding its stride in season 2 with a formula which pushes the envelope while still being doable, this series packs ample portions of entertainment into 40 minute episodes while staying fresh, delivering palatable doses of science didactically, and, most of all, manifesting a strong sense of social responsibility in all of its subliminals. While most entertainment aims for the crotch, the gut, or the heart, "CSI" goes for the most difficult target, the head, as it teaches forensics and the empirical process while remaining cooly detached from sensationalism and melodrama all the while using the "truth is stranger (and more interesting) than fiction" thesis to its and our advantage. The results are fun and interesting lessons in everything from dwarfism to Down syndrome to anatomy to ballistics to etc. all the while maintaining a social conscience. Whether explaining how S&M is not necessarily perversion to simply dissing Don King, "CSI" is one sweet sugar coated education with solid mainstream values. My favorite lines? CSI1:"There's a sucker born every minute." CSI2: "Yeah. And they all come to Vegas." Truer words....","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":80000,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2000-10-06","keywords":"crime scene investigation,las vegas nevada,crime lab,police,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000401/","name":"Laurence Fishburne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001339/","name":"Marg Helgenberger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0247040/","name":"George Eads"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958499/","name":"Anthony E. programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
Investigação Criminal: Los Angeles
programme.desc: NCIS: Los Angeles: Created by Shane Brennan. With Chris O'Donnell, Daniela Ruah, LL Cool J, Linda Hunt. The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1378167/","name":"NCIS: Los Angeles","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGQzNGIzNmEtNWE3ZS00OTUyLTg3YTEtMDY3NDViZWE0YWY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Naval Criminal Investigation Service's Office of Special Projects takes on the undercover work and the hard to crack cases in LA. Key agents are G. Callen and Sam Hanna, streets kids risen through the ranks.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1378167/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"babettex5"},"dateCreated":"2010-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Linda Hunt is the main reason I tune in","reviewBody":"As opposed to other reviewers who are sadly so limited they can only conceive of Linda Hunt as an object of derision, I tune in specifically to see her. The show is adequate. I've always liked LL Cool J and it's nice to see Chris O'Donnell again. (The nerds suck, especially when you consider Abby from the original show.) But it's the presence of Linda Hunt that elevates this show. She's a rich, interesting actor and her character here has a great backstory.\n\nSure this team could be managed by yet another grizzled actor playing a tough as nails former Navy Seal type, whose life has been touched by tragedy because his wife died of breast cancer or his little girl choked on a marble. I'd rather have Linda Hunt because she is a true original. I've seen enough shallow cookie cutter actors with impossibly white teeth and ripped abs. programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
Investigação Criminal: New Orleans
programme.desc: NCIS: New Orleans: Created by Gary Glasberg. With Scott Bakula, Rob Kerkovich, CCH Pounder, Daryl Mitchell. Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3560084/","name":"NCIS: New Orleans","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM3OTk1NTQyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjU4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows an NCIS team that investigates criminal cases involving military personnel in The Big Easy, a city known for its music, entertainment, and decadence.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3560084/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"household137"},"dateCreated":"2014-10-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Review of NCIS New Orleans","reviewBody":"As a New Orleans native I implore you and the writers to walk down any street in New Orleans and talk to a LOCAL. We DO NOT eat shrimp and grits for breakfast and praline bacon isn't in our fridge. We have worked very hard to come back from Katrina and it PAINS ME that this series (which I love and watch regularly) is making us look like uneducated loud mouth pigs. Please - come uptown and take a census of LOCALS, have a LOCAL help you with the dialect!! We DO NOT talk like that unless your're from Mississippi. PLEASE! I LOVE my city and would LOVE for the series to continue and for us New Orleanians to sound like the intelligent up and coming tech community that we are! Thank you!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16652,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2014-09-23","keywords":"usa,united states,investigation,naval officer,u.s. navy","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000836/","name":"Scott Bakula"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1827376/","name":"Rob Kerkovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001634/","name":"CCH Pounder"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0373192/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113138/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0321782/","name":"Gary Glasberg"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"NCIS: New Orleans: The Fourth Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1485290009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNkZDYwZjEtMWNlZi00Zjg5LWJhYjktYmY0NzY0ODM2NjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzNkZDYwZjEtMWNlZi00Zjg5LWJhYjktYmY0NzY0ODM2NjM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Promo"}}</script><metacontent="
